languages.text: All allies in a circle with a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Every additional stack of this effect increases the resolve {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} by +2.

Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя. Каждый дополнительный уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} увеличивает этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} на 2.

languages.text: 提高5格内的所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，数值等同于{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果每叠加一次，决心{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}便会提高2点。

traits.locale_text: 提高5格内的所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，数值等同于<u>灵能等级</u>，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果每叠加一次，决心{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}便会提高2点。
提高5格内的所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，数值等同于{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果每叠加一次，决心{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}便会提高2点。

languages.text: Todos los aliados situados en una zona circular de 5 casillas de radio ganan +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate. Cada acumulación adicional de este efecto aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a la firmeza en +2.
languages.original_text: All allies in a circle with a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Every additional stack of this effect increases the resolve {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} by +2.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados situados en una zona circular de 5 casillas de radio ganan +<u>factor psíquico</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} hasta el final del combate. Cada acumulación adicional de este efecto aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} al brío en +2.

Todos los aliados situados en una zona circular de 5 casillas de radio ganan +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} hasta el final del combate. Cada acumulación adicional de este efecto aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} al brío en +2.

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Feldern erlangen bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}-{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Jeder zusätzliche Stapel dieses Effekts erhöht den Entschlossenheits{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} um +2.
languages.original_text: All allies in a circle with a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Every additional stack of this effect increases the resolve {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} by +2.

traits.locale_text: Alle Verbündeten innerhalb eines 5-Zellen-Radius erlangen bis zum Ende des Kampfes +<u>Psi-Wert</u>-{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Jeder zusätzliche Stapel dieses Effekts erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Entschlossenheitsbonus{/g} um +2.

Alle Verbündeten innerhalb eines 5-Zellen-Radius erlangen bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}-{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Jeder zusätzliche Stapel dieses Effekts erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Entschlossenheitsbonus{/g} um +2.

languages.text: Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque cumul supplémentaire de cet effet accroît de +2 le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de détermination.
languages.original_text: All allies in a circle with a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Every additional stack of this effect increases the resolve {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} by +2.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés présents dans un cercle d'un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +<u>indice psy</u> jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque cumul supplémentaire de cet effet accroît de +2 le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de détermination.

Tous les alliés présents dans un cercle d'un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Chaque cumul supplémentaire de cet effet accroît de +2 le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de détermination.

languages.text: 半径5セル以内にいるすべての味方は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}される。この効果が累積するたびに、決断力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が+2増加する。
languages.original_text: All allies in a circle with a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Every additional stack of this effect increases the resolve {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} by +2.

traits.locale_text: 半径5セル以内にいるすべての味方は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+<u>超能力レート</u>される。この効果が累積するたびに、決断力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が+2増加する。
半径5セル以内にいるすべての味方は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}される。この効果が累積するたびに、決断力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: 5 hücrelik yarıçapı olan bir daire içindeki tüm dost birimler, +{uip|Resolve|6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanırlar. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu etki, üst üste her biriktiğinde kararlılık {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusunu{/g} 2 puan artırır.
